bibl.title: Gallus as Triptolemos on the Tazza Farnese.
bibl.note: 1. An Archaeological Analysis of the Tazza Farnese (D.B.T.). - 2. The Adaptation of Hellenized Egyptian Thought (a. The Ruler as Giver of Nile Flood and Prosperity; - b. Gallus, the Nile Flood, and the Horos Ritual of Edfu; - c. The Enrichment of Temples in One of the New Epigrams by Gallus) (L.K.). - 3. Interpretation of the Tazza Farnese (D.B.T. and L.K.).
Thompson Dorothy Burr and Ludwig Koenen, Gallus as Triptolemos on the Tazza Farnese.
